description: Information about changes to a document (DXR) record.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EVENT_START_DTTM
columns.description: Start instant for the event corresponding to this row.

columns.name: EVENT_END_DTTM
columns.description: End instant for the event corresponding to this row.

columns.name: EVENT_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Unique identifier for the encounter in which the document was edited on the remote system. This is either a contact serial number or, if using IntraConnect, a Unique Contact Identifier.

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: Free text name of the type of encounter in which the document was edited on the remote system.

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The encounter type category ID for the patient's encounter in which the document was edited on the remote system. Category values can be found in ZC_ORDER_TYPE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EVENT_SPECIALTY_NAME
columns.description: Free text name of the specialty of the department on the remote system where the patient's encounter took place.

columns.name: EVENT_SPECIALTY_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
The department specialty category ID for the patient's encounter on the remote system. Category values can be found in ZC_SPECIALTY_DEP.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EVENT_DEPT_NAME
columns.description: Free text name of the department on the remote system where the patient's encounter took place.

columns.name: EVENT_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department on the remote system where the patient's encounter occurred.

columns.name: EVENT_DESC
columns.description: Free text description of the patient's encounter on the remote system.

columns.name: EVENT_DOC_ID
columns.description: Universally unique identifier for the encounter document linked to this event.

columns.name: EVENT_DOC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The document type category ID for the document associated with the patient's encounter corresponding to this row. Category values can be found in ZC_DOC_CONTENT_TYPE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EVENT_LOCATION_NAME
columns.description: Free text of the location name associated with the patient's encounter on the remote system.

columns.name: EVENT_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location on the remote system where the patient's encounter occurred.

columns.name: EVENT_HOME_COMM_ID

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_MOOD_CMP
columns.description: This item stores the value from the moodCode node for an encounter in a received CDA document.

columns.name: EVENT_ED_TO_INP_CMP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this encounter was upgraded from ED to Inpatient.  Y indicates that the encounter was upgraded from ED to Inpatient.  N indicates an inpatient encounter that was not upgraded from ED.  Null indicates either a non-inpatient encounter or an encounter for which this information is not available.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EVENT_KEY_CMP
columns.description: Key for use by other related event groups.

columns.name: EVENT_MED_REV_CMP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the medication associated with the event was reviewed or not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EVENT_ED_TO_INP_CMP_YN

columns.name: EVENT_LOS_CPT_CMP
columns.description: This item stores the level of service CPT (Current Procedure Terminology) code for where the encounter took place.

columns.name: EVENT_SET_ID_CMP
columns.description: Document set ID that represents a common identifier across all document revisions.

columns.name: EVNT_SERVICE_EVENT
columns.description: Stores the service event ID from an incoming CDA document.

columns.name: CREATE_INSTANT_COMPLD_DTTM
columns.description: Holds the creation instant of the document as returned by the query response header. This is distinct from I DXR 172, which is the creation instant as returned by metadata within the received document.

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_IDENT
columns.description: Compiled encounter identifier received from the remote system. This is only populated for documents received from non-Epic organizations.

columns.name: EVENT_TITLE
columns.description: Title of a document associated with an event.
